Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The barsicore Yunaras Snaggletooth has developed a taste for amani flesh. To protect amani civilians and soldiers in the Plain of the Damned, this monster must be eliminated.

Hunt and destroy the barsicore.

Report to Raneria in Habere when the mission is complete.
Here's your reward, as well as the Valkyon Federation's gratitude!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
